activities: Cornerstone seeks to cover aggregated travel data stored in a data warehouse which is available for viewing via a reporting engine and user portal via iBank and iQCX websites.  The data warehouse contains travel itinerary data only and does store some personal identifiable information none of which is gathered via the website.  On-Line viewing of the data is accessible only to the traveler or organization under secure access and is not shared or transmitted to other parties.  Human resources data and customer data is not stored in the warehouse or viewed on the website.  Cornerstone is a third-party data aggregator of travel itinerary data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
